assets.notes: Standard AJAX loader GIF from a plugin. This will be replaced by the new website's UI/plugin choices and is not a core brand asset.

shots: Professional headshots of all attorneys, suitable for 'Team' and 'About Us' pages
Team photos in various collaborative settings within the office
High-quality interior shots of the firm's office space, including conference rooms, reception, and working environments
Candid shots illustrating the firm's professional yet approachable culture
photographyBrief.style: Modern, authentic, professional, and inviting, emphasizing expertise and client trust.

images.description: A comprehensive set of custom icons for each 'Area of Practice' and key service offerings. Icons should be modern, clean, and abstractly represent legal concepts without being generic or clich√©.
images.purpose: To visually break up text, improve readability, and enhance the user experience for content-heavy sections like 'Areas of Practice'.
